name: Chempri - Stearic Acid Beads
description: Chempri specializes in Stearic Acid Beads (includes palmitic acid and stearic acid) for cosmetic formulations and barrier repair applications. As an oleochemicals and derivatives specialist, Chempri offers bead form for easy handling and precise formulation. Stearic acid functions as an emollient and thickener in barrier repair systems.

Chempri is an oleochemicals and derivatives specialist offering Stearic Acid Beads (includes palmitic acid and stearic acid) in bead form for easy handling. Their fatty acid products are essential components for barrier repair formulations, providing lipid matrix support, emulsification, and thickening properties.
products: Stearic Acid Beads (includes palmitic and stearic acids)
notes: Oleochemicals and derivatives specialist. Bead form provides easy handling and precise dosing. Contains both palmitic and stearic acid for comprehensive barrier repair support. Suitable for various cosmetic formulations.

Oleochemicals and derivatives specialist from Netherlands. Stearic Acid Beads combine palmitic and stearic acids in easy-to-handle bead form. Essential fatty acids for skin barrier lipid matrix formation. Bead form improves handling and dissolution in formulations. Ideal for barrier repair formulations requiring precise fatty acid ratios with convenient processing.
